actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require the governing boards and compensation committees of Medicare national accrediting entities have public representation and the governing boards have public meetings as a condition of recognizing their accreditation under the Medicare Program.
short_title: Improvement of Medicare Accrediting Entity Act of 1999

summary.text: Improvement of Medicare Accrediting Entity Act of 1999 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require: (1) the governing boards and compensation committees of Medicare national accrediting entities to have public representation, subject to certain restrictions; and (2) such governing boards to have public meetings under certain conditions.

titles.title: Improvement of Medicare Accrediting Entity Act of 1999

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require the governing boards and compensation committees of Medicare national accrediting entities have public representation and the governing boards have public meetings as a condition of recognizing their accreditation under the Medicare Program.
